name: Bokube Beta Playtest
description:
BUILD RELEASES: 

Every one to two weeks a new file will be added to this page that includes a new world to playtest. There are 8 worlds in total. The reason for not launching all these at once is so I can finish extra polish and audio work. 

CONTROLS (because I’m not making a new tutorial section of the game until the entire game is done). 

WASD=move

Left Shift=dash (space to cancel a dash)

Space=HOP/JUMP IN PLACE (Must be sitting still)

LEFT CONTROL+WASD =pull/grab a puzzle cube (more so if you get one stuck in a corner)

ARROW KEYS=camera move

E KEY=zoom in camera

R KEY= restart level

ESC- quit game

*Note you can also play with a gamepad*. 

IF YOU HAVE SOUND ISSUES: 

If you dislike the audio quality or the audio levels, open your sound volume mixer and mute the game. Much of the game is still going through audio development. (Though I'd prefer you to give me feedback on whats there currently). 

GAME RULES:

  1. Push all 3 yellow puzzle cubes into their goals. This will make the cage holding a living captured brown bokube open. Touch them to move into the next level.
  2. You can push puzzle cubes into living enemies to kill them. Puzzle cubes don’t effect traps however.
  3.  Survive boss encounters to eventually finish them off with a puzzle cube. (Some bosses will take multiple hits from a puzzle cube).
